entities.name: Gitlab with PostgreSQL, Redis store and Nginx

config.name: gitlab.email.from
config.description: Email address Gitlab will use to send email
config.label: Gitlab email from property

config.name: gitlab.email.display_name
config.description: Display name Gitlab will use to send email
config.label: Gitlab display name property

config.name: gitlab.email.reply_to
config.description: Email address users will reply to from an email sent by Gitlab
config.label: Gitlab email to property

config.name: gitlab.db.username
config.description: The username to connect to the Gitlab database
config.label: Gitlab database username

config.name: gitlab.db.password
config.description: The password to connect to the Gitlab database
config.label: Gitlab database password

config.name: gitlab.db.database
config.description: The database name to connect to
config.label: Gitlab database name

config.name: connect.mode
config.description: Set the connect mode to "gitlab" to restrict TCP/IP connections from Gitlab instance only or "all" for any hosts
config.label: Connect mode
